entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
